item.description:
Lets get together for an evening of fashion, glamor and fun during Boston Fashion Week. Guests will enjoy a cocktail party and fashion show hosted by Emily Riemer, News Channel 5 anchor/reporter and featuring Smiling Stiletto Shoe Club members modeling top fashions by Copley Place retailers including:

  • Bebe
  • Eileen Fisher
  • Nouveau
  • Intimacy
  • Tumi
  • Banana Republic Women

Guests will also enjoy complimentary:

  • Voli Vodka Cocktails
  • Maine Mead tasting
  • Finale desserts
  • Chef Bernard appetizers
  • Legal Seafood appetizers
  • Pop Chips
  • Saka Water

Ladies- be sure to break out your sexiest shoes for a chance to strut your stuff onstage during the Best-in-Shoe competition and win some fabulous prizes. Guests will receive a gift bag.

 

For those who are able to arrive early, there are exclusive shopping opportunities and promotions for guests from 5-6:30pm.

 

Proceeds will benefit Project Smile, the non profit organization helping children involved in traumatic events and the Simon Youth Foundation. Tix are $20.

 

Be sure to get your tickets early. This is a 21+ event. Please click on the link to register and get your tickets! A limited number of tix are available at the door, $20, cash only.

http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e68v7np480bdf0d8&llr=lzytkqcab
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside the event area. I am hosting the event! If you have trouble finding us, call 774 232 0000
item.name: Boston Fashion Week: Fashion Show and Cocktail Party, Copley Place
